settings.title: Who Is Kjus?
settings.content:
Kjus, pronounced 'Shu-ss, was founded in 2000 by alpine ski champion Lasse Kjus who simply felt that functionality and performance were more important than fashion for a full day on the mountain facing the elements.

As it turns out, his desire for functional apparel not only filled a gap, it created a brand. KJUS was forged through a passion to enable people to reach the absolute top of their game.

settings.title: Why We Love Kjus
settings.content: One of the great technology features in KJUS apparel is their PERFECT CLIMATE™ system. Optimum body temperature is a decisive factor for comfort and the ability to perform in sports.

settings.title: OUR HISTORY TOGETHER
settings.content: We have been honored to be partnered with Kjus for many years and it has been a pleasure to outfit our clients with their line of performance ski apparel online and in-store.

settings.html: Premium performance sportswear engineered with unparalleled quality and high-tech innovation to enhance your mountain experiences for a full day of comfort and warmth.

settings.title: Body Temperature in Balance
settings.content: With KJUS, The Weather Is Never Too Cold, Too Wet, Too Windy Or Too Warm. Their Intelligent Fabrics Trap Sufficient Heat And Release It When Needed, Stand Up To The Harshest Downpours And Winds, Wick Excess Moisture Away And Offer Maximum Patented Ventilation Systems Such As The AC-Vent™.

settings.title: Freedom of Movement
settings.content: All Fabrics from Kjus Will Move Along With Your Actions, No Matter How Extreme They Are. We Revolutionized Stretch And Brought It Into Sportswear. In Addition, their Anatomical Cuts And Trailblazing Lightweight Materials Ensure Maximum Comfort For Maximum Performance. Each Piece Of KJUS Clothing Features Optimized Seam Lines, To Perfectly Match The Athlete’s Body And Activity.

settings.title: Exquisite Craftsmanship
settings.content: From Laser-Cut, Non-Chafing Seams To The Functional Details Of their Garments, Such As Integrated Goggle Pouches, KJUS Crafts Unparalleled Sporting Experiences, Based On Our Quality Workmanship And Innovative Thinking.
